verses.text: Hear \w my|strong="H1732"\w* voice, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* complaint: preserve \w my|strong="H1732"\w* life from fear \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* enemy.

Hide \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w secret|strong="H5341"\w* counsel \w of|strong="H6963"\w* evil-doers; \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* tumult \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* workers \w of|strong="H6963"\w* iniquity:

\w Who|strong="H7489"\w* \w have|strong="H7489"\w* whet \w their|strong="H5641"\w* tongue like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H6466"\w* \w have|strong="H7489"\w* aimed \w their|strong="H5641"\w* arrows, even bitter words:

\w That|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H1697"\w* \w may|strong="H2719"\w* \w shoot|strong="H1869"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* secret places at \w the|strong="H1697"\w* perfect: suddenly \w do|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H1697"\w* \w shoot|strong="H1869"\w* at \w him|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* fear not.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* encourage themselves \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w an|strong="H3384"\w* evil purpose; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* commune \w of|strong="H3372"\w* laying snares privily; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* say, \w Who|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* see \w them|strong="H3384"\w*?

\w They|strong="H1697"\w* \w search|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H2388"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H1697"\w*; \w We|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* accomplished, \add say they\add*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* diligent \w search|strong="H7200"\w*: \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* inward \w thought|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w every|strong="H1697"\w* \w one|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* heart, \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w deep|strong="H2388"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3820"\w* \w God|strong="H2664"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* shoot at \w them|strong="H7130"\w*; \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w an|strong="H8552"\w* arrow suddenly \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* wounded.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H6597"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* stumble, \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* tongue \w being|strong="H1961"\w* against \w them|strong="H1961"\w*: all \w that|strong="H1961"\w* see \w them|strong="H1961"\w* shall wag \w the|strong="H1961"\w* head.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* fear; \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* declare \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* wisely \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* doing.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* \w be|strong="H3372"\w* glad \w in|strong="H7919"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3372"\w* \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* trust \w in|strong="H7919"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*; \w and|strong="H3372"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* upright \w in|strong="H7919"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* glory.
